text:
fPop 52 fHot 1

Michelle Williams is grateful to all those who have reached out to her since she revealed her battle with depression.

Posting on her Instagram yesterday, the former Destiny’s Child singer noted that her family and friends, plus her faith, has kept her strong. “Thank you ALL sooooooooooooooo much for every message of love and support sent!” the singer wrote on Instagram on Saturday, alongside a photo of herself sitting on a straw chair while wearing a white outfit—her first social...
title: Destiny’s Child’s Michelle Williams Thanks Fans for Support Amid Depression Battle
